name: Beef Ragu Sauce
description: A hearty, delicious, easy solution for your family's weeknight dinner. Treat yourself to the ultimate comfort food experience with our Beef Ragu Sauce. Itâ€™s packed with hearty flavours of beef and tomatoes and can be made in under 30 minutes for an easy weeknight dinner. Our pasta pick: Pappardelle. Its large, flat shape is perfect for thick, meaty sauces.

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, chicken, or turkey

preparation: In a frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Crumble in meat, then grind Salt and Pepper overtop.
Use a Ground Meat Separator to break up meat. Stir often until cooked through, 5 - 8 minutes.
Pour in wine. Bring to a boil and stir often until most of the liquid is absorbed, 1 - 2 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes and add Sauce Mix. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat. Partially cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 10 - 15 minutes to allow flavour to blend. Serve sauce over chunky noodles.
